content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello, Nesibe Trabelsi. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find the apartment in Mannheim to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. How much were you considering to pay for such a space?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I was thinking of a price around 550 Euro per month, considering the size and location of the apartment. Is this within your budget?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Nesibe Trabelsi, your offer of 550 Euro per month is quite reasonable, given the size and location of the apartment. However, as a landlord, I am always looking to maximize my gains. Is there any flexibility in your budget? Could you possibly offer a bit more?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position, Mister Heine. I'm willing to negotiate. How much more were you thinking?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Nesibe Trabelsi, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. An increase to 575 Euro per month would be more in line with my expectations. This would reflect a fair balance between your budget and my desire to achieve the highest price possible. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine
